channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg takes a cue from Elon Musk: Facebook and Instagram will ditch fact-checking and instead rely on community notes
item.description: The Meta CEO announced changes to content moderation just in time for a familiar incoming presidential administration.

item.title: McDonald’s just gave the value menu its biggest shakeup in years
Tesla battery cell partner CATL threatens to sue Pentagon after landing on China ‘blacklist’
item.description: A key partner for Elon Musk’s Tesla is threatening to sue the U.S. government over the Pentagon’s decision to blacklist it from federal contracts, bla...

item.title: Millions will get higher Social Security benefits after Biden signs ‘fairness’ bill
item.description: "Americans who have worked hard all their lives to earn an honest living should be able to retire with economic security and dignity," Biden said.

item.title: Tesla downgraded as analysts see more risks ahead than the stock reflects
